AI-Assisted Movement & Muscle Care

Get more than just pain relief—discover the future of personalized movement assessment.

Why Choose AI + Advanced Tech?

At YW Physical Therapy, I combine years of manual therapy expertise with AI-powered movement analysis and cutting-edge devices. The result? Faster recovery, precise diagnosis of movement faults, and a training plan built just for you.

AI-Powered Movement Analysis

A smart blend of AI-assisted clinical evaluation and functional movement screening. Whether you're in pain or optimizing performance, our system detects hidden issues and gives you a personalized path forward—with clear exercises and expert insight.

Advanced Device Intervention

Rapid Release, EMS, shockwave, laser, and more—select the right tool for your unique soft tissue problem, not a one-size-fits-all protocol.

Personalized Corrective Exercise

Every client gets a custom movement plan targeting your specific deficits, delivered with clear instructions and ongoing follow-up.

How My AI-Powered Process Works

1. AI-Assisted Evaluation & Physical Therapy

  1. Comprehensive Intake: Share your concerns and goals for therapy.
  2. AI-Assisted Movement Evaluation: I combine advanced AI analysis with hands-on clinical tests for a complete picture of your movement.
  3. Pinpoint the Cause: Identify if your issue is soft tissue, joint restriction, or movement dysfunction—not nerve injury.
  4. Advanced Treatment & Tech: The right device (shockwave, laser, EMS, etc.) plus manual therapy and education as needed.
  5. Custom Corrective Exercise Plan: You get a personalized program with feedback and ongoing support.

2. AI Movement Assessment (Wellness & Performance)

  1. 10 Functional Movement Tests: AI analyzes your movement and spots compensations, mobility limits, and weaknesses.
  2. Instant Feedback & Exercise Suggestions: Get a wellness-focused report with tailored exercise recommendations for self-improvement.

Who Benefits Most?

My methods are ideal for people with:
• Chronic muscle or tendon pain
• Sports, work, or daily activity injuries
• Muscle tightness, imbalance, or fatigue
• Poor posture or restricted mobility

Not for neurological injury or severe nerve damage (e.g. spinal cord injury, stroke, ALS).

What You Get: AI Movement Report & Custom Plan

After your session, you'll receive a summary of findings and an easy-to-follow corrective exercise program—so you always know exactly what to work on and how to progress.
